name: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder
false_positives: Unlikely, there could be conferencing software running from a Temp folder accessing the devices
query: (registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Cc][Aa][Pp][Aa][Bb][Ii][Ll][Ii][Tt][Yy][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ss][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\.*/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Nn][Oo][Nn][Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Dd].*/ AND registry.path:(/.*[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Pp][Hh][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ee][Bb][Cc][Aa][Mm].*/) AND registry.path:(/.*\:#[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]#[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]#.*/ OR /.*\:#$[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee]\.[Bb][Ii][Nn]#.*/ OR /.*\:#[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]#.*/ OR /.*\:#[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]#[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]#.*/ OR /.*\:#[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]#[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]#.*/ OR /.*\:#[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]#[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]#.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(registry.path:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\* AND registry.path:*\\NonPackaged* AND registry.path:(*microphone* OR *webcam*) AND registry.path:(*\:#Windows#Temp#* OR *\:#$Recycle.bin#* OR *\:#Temp#* OR *\:#Users#Public#* OR *\:#Users#Default#* OR *\:#Users#Desktop#*))`
